controls: Use your mouse to pick items.
content.howToPlay: Start by picking a character among boys and girls.Press the red button to spin the wheel and get an occupation.In this game, you can dress up in various professions.After getting the job, move between wardrobe, shoes, hairstyles and accessories.Each job has great items. When you're done with one look, spin the wheel again to get another job!If you'd like to change your character, just press the People button on the top right corner of your screen.
content.developer: Cute Melon My Dream Profession was created by FreezeNova.

fullContent: Homeâ€º Dress UpCute Melon My Dream ProfessionBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenWhat do you want to be when you grow up? An astronaut, a firefighter, or a pilot? With Cute Melon My Dream Profession, you can simulate your dream job and make stylish choices for your workday. This dress-up game is perfect for both girls and boys. Choose your occupation and dress up your character to impress your colleagues.ControlsComputersUse your mouse to pick items.MobilesTap to pick items.How to Play Cute Melon My Dream ProfessionStart by picking a character among boys and girls.Press the red button to spin the wheel and get an occupation.In this game, you can dress up in various professions.After getting the job, move between wardrobe, shoes, hairstyles and accessories.Each job has great items. When you're done with one look, spin the wheel again to get another job!If you'd like to change your character, just press the People button on the top right corner of your screen.Which Occupations Can I Dress Up?Firefighter: A bright red uniform and helmet, and you are ready to save the lives of humans (or maybe kittensðŸ¥°).Policeman: Dress in various blue uniforms and hats, go for law and order.Businessman: A sharp, shining suit and chic bags for a professional look.Dancer: Freaky costumes and accessories perfect for a crazy dancer.Scientist: Lab coats and safety goggles for conducting experiments.Doctor: Medical scrubs and stethoscopes for healing the sick.Engineer: Hard hats and tool belts, ready to build and supervise.Astronaut: Space suits and helmets are crucial parts of interstellar adventures.Pilot: Uniforms and aviator glasses fly above the skies.Athlete: Sports uniforms and equipment, run for the Olympics!Soldier: Camouflage outfits and boots, action begins!Musician: Choose between trendy clothes and musical instruments before your big performance.DeveloperCute Melon My Dream Profession was created by FreezeNova.Benefits of PlayPlaying Cute Melon My Dream Profession game is not just fun, it's also educational. Your kid will get a visual understanding of how different professions look. With an interactive and engaging environment, both boys and girls can have a great time dressing up characters in their dream professions.More Games Like ThisIf you like dress up games with interesting content, we got your back. Go see all your alternatives in the fashion game online page. We're always updating our library to offer you the newest and greatest games online! Bookmark this website to keep coming back!We'd Like to Hear From You!Tell us in the comments which look or job was your favorite and why. What do you dream of becoming when you grow up? We'd love to know! Share your thoughts and ideas about the game: Did you enjoy dressing up your character? Which profession did you find the most interesting? Were there any professions you wanted to see but couldn't find in the game? Your feedback helps us make the game even better!This article was updated on July 23, 20241 Player2DDress UpFashionFreeGirlHTML5KidsMobileMouse
